title: there was a story printed concerning a man and his father that decided to add an addition on to the son\'s home instead of the son buying another home. They discussed using green products in their project. I would like to have a copy of that article. Thank you.
text:
You can access that article on StarNewsOnline.com or if you wish to
purchase the newspaper that article was in, please call our
circulation department at 343-2330.
